comment: aromatase, ARO three successive reactions (R02501+R04761+R03087) subsequently R04761
definition: Testosterone + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 19-Hydroxytestosterone + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: testosterone,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (19-hydroxylating)
